title: Some Kinda Love
description:
Jamie Brickhouse, David Hu and Theresa Miller share stories about a mother's parting gifts, a father's views on Porky's, and the One who works in mysterious ways.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Christian McBride Trio, Jamie Brickhouse, Rose Royce, Theresa Miller, Broken Bells, kevin Allison, David Hu)
